about_the_game: Kick start your career in the DIRT Off-Road Series with the gameplay booster pack - increasing your XP and currency gains permanently! To use this pack, you must own DIRT 5.
detailed_description: Kick start your career in the DIRT Off-Road Series with the gameplay booster pack - increasing your XP and currency gains permanently! To use this pack, you must own DIRT 5.

name: DIRT 5 - Gameplay Booster Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit versions of Windows® 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Kick start your career in the DIRT Off-Road Series with the gameplay booster pack - increasing your XP and currency gains permanently! To use this pack, you must own DIRT 5.

English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*
